mods.abstract: A Runaway in Jail. WAS committed into the Jail of the Parish of St. Landy, on the 13th instant, 1854, a negro-man calling himself MAURICE, aged about 22 years, 5 feet, 9 inches high, having a sore on the left leg ; he speaks french and english. Maurice says he belongs to Messers. J.W. Payne & Brother, residing on Bayou BÅ“uf, in this Parish. The owner is requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges and take him away, otherwise he will be disposed of, accordint to law. LOUIS L BOUTTE, Jailor. Opelousas, 17th June, 1854.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
